get.description:
By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for
available statistics in the system

examples.application/json:
{
    {
        "status": "success",
        "name": "S0Clutch",
        "AB": {
            " Victories ": "5",
            " Completed missions ": "6",
            " Victories/battles ratio ": "83%",
            " Deaths ": "16",
            " Lions earned ": "1,512",

            " Ground targets destroyed ": "1",
            " Naval targets destroyed ": "1"
        },
        "RB": {

            " Deaths ": "37",

get.description:
By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for
available vehicle statistics in the system
